989240.name: Parallel World
989240.description:
Description


Parallel World is a variant of Find Difference Game.
I use 3D Worlds instead of using still images to provide a new game experience.

Gameplay


Same as other tradition Find Difference Game, you need to find out the objects in different outlook. In addition, you also need to find out the difference behavior or movement between two worlds!
989240.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 丹麦语, 俄语, 保加利亚语, 匈牙利语, 土耳其语, 希腊语, 挪威语, 捷克语, 日语, 波兰语, 泰语, 乌克兰语, 瑞典语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 罗马尼亚语, 芬兰语, 荷兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 越南语, 阿拉伯语, 韩语
